#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	unsigned long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		unsigned long long n,k,q=0;
		cin>>n>>k;
		if(n==1)
			cout<<"1\n";
		else if(k==1)
			cout<<n<<"\n";
		else
		{
			while(n)
			{
			    q+=int(float(n%k));;
			    n=(n-(int(float(n%k))))/k;
			}
			cout<<q<<"\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
